summary: The module provides unit tests for the OpenGL backend, using helper utilities to tokenize, parse, and generate code from GLSL snippets, and verifies correct handling of various language constructs such as if/else, loops, function calls, and I/O.
business_intent: Validate the functionality and reliability of the GLSL lexer, parser, and code generation pipeline in the OpenGL backend, ensuring accurate translation of shader code constructs.
